name: Shanties in Strange Waters
description:
"Come on, all you lubbers! We're going to sea!"

Try to keep up with the crew's halyard shanty in this short rhythm game at sea. Keep the decks and sightlines clear to earn extra points. Try again to raise your score!

Just try not to anger the sea gods. These are strange waters indeed.

Made for Water Themed Game Jam - February 2021

Attribution: Seagull sound from mmiron
